data.name: Thunderbolt_Explanation
data.value:
If you only had 50 movies and TV shows to bring with them on a desert island, what would they be?
It does add the show to the list of items your personally recommend. It creates better personal recommendations for you.

data.name: PersonalRecomendation_TooMuchExplanation
data.value: You can only add 50 personal recommendations. Remove one before adding this one !

data.name: Global_EraseAccount_Description
data.value: We are sorry to see you left Trakt.tv. Please click "delete account" in the next page.

data.name: Android_FixNotificationLabel
data.value: Notifications are disabled by default and you need to explicitly enable them.

data.name: Android_FixNotificationConfirmQuestion
data.value:
Notifications are disabled by default and you need to explicitly enable them. You must authorize two permissions : notifications and exact alarm.
You can do it at anytime later in the app's settings.
Do you want to do it now ?

data.name: DemoMode_CantDoThis
data.value: This is not possible in demo mode.

data.name: Global_Error_AccountLimitExceededContent
data.value:
You have reached one of the limits imposed by Trakt for free accounts: - 100 items maximum in your watchlist - 10 personal lists maximum
I’m sorry for the inconvenience, but these restrictions are set by Trakt and are beyond my control.
However, you can still add a series by marking an episode as watched—this will not count towards the limit.
To remove these restrictions, I encourage you to consider upgrading to a VIP subscription on Trakt.

data.name: Changelog_FooterText
data.value: Thank you for your feedback and suggestions! Your support means a lot to me. 💙

data.name: Startup_ConnectionDevicodeCode_CopyCodeAndOpenLink
data.value: Copy the code and open the link

data.name: IncitationToDonate_Content_Text
data.value:
To thank you, ads are gone for 2 weeks 😊.
I build this app alone in my spare time (what’s left of it with 3 kids 😉).
If you'd like to support the project, I'd really appreciate it 💖!
